summary: Adds a lovely shack to a cliff near whiterun
descriptionHtml:
Whiteruns retreat - Are you tired of the noisy days in Whiterun? This mods adds a small but lovely designed house to a cliff near whiterun.

It doesnt use any new textures or anything all i provide you with is an .esp :)
House contains enchanting, sleeping, storage(safe) (bookshelves included).
Alchemy and smithing are located on the outside and will let you have a view over whiterun and its large, beautiful tundra, images will give you further information :). I did navmesh the house but since im inexperienced ( this is the first mod i ever released ) the followers movements are very bad and they wont be able to go everywhere, also they cant enter the house for some reason :( . Sorry for your followers.

Since i dont want anyone to be disappointed, i will list the mods that might play a role in the pictures:
-SMIM static mesh improvement
-W.A.T.E.R
-enhanced distant view
-Alternate sunglare
-Moss rocks
-Realistic lightning overhaul
author: warcrafttfz
